title: Solana treasury Upexi posts record quarter powered by $78 million in unrealized SOL gains
contentSnippet: Upexi's net income totaled $66.7 million compared to a net loss of $1.6 million for the year-ago period, according to a release.

title: Bitcoin Miners Must Own Power—or Die Trying Before Next Halving, MARA CEO Says
contentSnippet: With block rewards set to plunge, only miners with energy control or AI pivots are likely to survive, Thiel argues.

title: User Revolt Erupts on X as Character AI Quit Posts Go Viral
contentSnippet: User defections from Character.AI surged after a viral screenshot highlighted the app’s emotionally charged account-deletion prompt.

title: Pro-XRP Lawyer John Deaton Is Running for Senate in Massachusetts—Again
contentSnippet: Crypto-focused lawyer John Deaton is taking on Democrat Ed Markey after losing by 20 points to industry foil Elizabeth Warren last year.

title: ZCash shielded pool climbs to 23% of supply as network usage surges
contentSnippet: The increase in shielding coincides with significant price appreciation as ZEC surged from approximately $400 on Nov. 1 to as high as $750.

title: Bitcoin User Pays Over $105,000 in BTC to Send Just $10
contentSnippet: One expert called the event a "non-standard way of crafting a transaction."

title: Ethereum Is ‘The Infrastructure’ for Wall Street, Says Former BlackRock Executive
contentSnippet: Joseph Chalom is betting his next act on Ethereum, calling it the only chain institutions can trust to digitize finance.

title: China accuses US of stealing $13 billion in bitcoin hack: Bloomberg

title: Coinbase scuttles $2 billion deal to acquire stablecoin startup BVNK

title: Coinbase Abandons $2 Billion Acquisition of Stablecoin Firm BVNK: Fortune
contentSnippet: American crypto exchange Coinbase has scrapped plans to acquire stablecoin firm BVNK, according to a report Tuesday.

title: MegaETH Revokes $1 Million Token Sale Allotment After Influencer Posts Trading Plans
contentSnippet: Crypto influencer IcoBeast had their $1 million MEGA token allocation revoked due to a social media post about hedging their bag.

title: Taurus, Stellar tapped for tokenized clean energy financing pilot in Spain

title: Elon Musk and Novelist Joyce Carol Oates Clash in Viral X Spat Over Meaning and Money
contentSnippet: A viral clash between novelist Joyce Carol Oates and Elon Musk over “soul” in the algorithmic age became a referendum on empathy, ego, and what it means to be human.

title: Bitdeer stock tumbles 30% after Q3 report but analysts defend long-term outlook
contentSnippet: Benchmark said Bitdeer’s Q3 report showed continued strength across self-mining and hosting, reaffirmed a "buy' rating and $38 price target.

title: The Daily: Lighter raises $68 million, Coinbase launches savings accounts, fraudster jailed after record UK bitcoin seizure, and more

title: Injective rolls out native EVM support on its high-performance Cosmos-based chain
contentSnippet: Tuesday marks a crucial step in Injective’s “MultiVM” roadmap to create a unified, composable environment for WASM and EVM apps.

title: Prosecutors seek new trial for MIT brothers after $25 million Ethereum fraud case ends in mistrial
contentSnippet: New York prosecutors are calling for another round in court after two brothers were accused of orchestrating a $25 million fraud on Ethereum.

title: SoFi Rolls Out Crypto Trading With Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana and More

title: HBAR Declines 2.1% to $0.183 as Volume Spike Signals Technical Breakdown

title: Bitcoin Miner CleanSpark Extends Stock Slump After Upsizing Notes Offering to $1.15 Billion
contentSnippet: CleanSpark is raising over $1 billion with plans to buy back stock, though its share price is falling for the second straight day.

title: Record UK bitcoin haul nets 11-year sentence for Chinese national who lived lavishly on stolen funds
contentSnippet: Zhimin Qian was sentenced to 11 years in prison in what prosecutors are calling the largest seizure ever of bitcoin in the UK.

title: How Nobody Sausage is Bringing its 33 Million Followers to Web3

title: Toncoin Drops to Key $2.07 Support Level as Selling Pressure Builds

title: ClearToken Wins UK Regulator Approval for Digital Asset Settlement Service
contentSnippet: ClearToken won authorization from the U.K.’s FCA to roll out CT Settle, a delivery-versus-payment settlement system for crypto, stablecoins and fiat currency.

title: Lighter Raises $68M at $1.5B Valuation to Take on Decentralized Derivatives Rivals: Report

title: Stellar Blockchain to Power Turbo Energy’s Tokenized Clean Energy Financing Initiative

title: Injective Launches Native EVM, Promising Faster and Cheaper DeFi
